version_description:
With this update, you can now view and edit your mbrace billing information, contact information, PIN and more, all within the My Vehicles section in the main menu.

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.
Our latest update includes minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

This update includes speed and performance improvements, as well as new lifestyle content within the inspire section. Thanks for using Mercedes me!

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.
Our latest update includes new features from Mercedes-Benz Financial Services for a more personalized view of your vehicle finances. Thanks for using Mercedes me!
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Our latest update includes minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.
Our latest update includes new features from Mercedes-Benz Financial Services for a more personalized view of your vehicle finances. Thanks for using Mercedes me!

Our latest update includes minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.

Our latest update includes minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.

Here’s what’s new in our latest release:
• The login system now lets you stay logged in as long as you’d like
• Quick Reference Guides were added to your vehicle manuals
• Remote Start was improved to reduce false error messages
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.

Here’s what’s new in our latest release:
• Mercedes-Benz Financial Services customers can now make one-time, recurring and principal payments, as well as view and edit their bank accounts, within the finance section
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.

Our latest update includes minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.

Our latest update includes minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.

Our latest update includes minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.

Here’s what’s new in our latest release:
• MBFS customers can now manage Auto Pay, see scheduled payments, view their transaction history and more
• If you’re in an accident, you can submit a report to a nearby Collision Center
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Our latest update includes minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Available for all customers with mbrace Connect and a 2016 or newer vehicle, and all customers with mbrace PLUS and a 2009-2015 vehicle.
Bug fixes for scheduling payments, deleting a bank account and disabling Auto Pay

•Login credentials will now sync across Mercedes me properties
•Links to the Mercedes me connect app are available for equipped vehicles
•Updated contact information for customer support
•Improvements to the finance pillar
•Face ID integration
•Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Fixed issue with initiating a second Remote Start after the previous attempt was unsuccessful
Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Vehicles you no longer own are now easier to remove
• SiriusXM trials and offers are available for qualified users
• Payment Breakdown provides additional details when making a payment
• There’s a new section in the finance pillar called Communication Preferences where you can edit your contact info and statement preferences
• Instead of providing your full SSN to link your MBFS account, only the last 4 digits are required
• Information like your name and vehicle is now automatically provided to Roadside Assistance when calling from within the app
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

• For MBFS customers, a bug was fixed so that when Auto Pay is disabled, the scheduled payments are canceled and no longer visible
• General bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

• The new Activity Feed, accessible in the main menu, lets you view a rundown of your latest activity in the app. It also includes important notifications and special offers just for you.
• For MBFS customers, an added layer of security was added when an unknown device is being used
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• MBFS customers can now receive loan payoff quotes and submit their payoff payment in the app
• MBFS customers can receive requested documents in the secure Document Center
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

*In addition, we’d like to acknowledge the recent outages with Remote Start. We are working hard to resolve the issues with this feature so that Mercedes me is as useful as possible. Thank you for your patience.
Bug fixes and performance improvements as we work to resolve the recent Remote Start outages
Bug fixes and performance improvements as we work to resolve the recent Remote Start outages

• My Dealers now includes separate Sales Dealers and Service Dealers for each vehicle
• Bug fixes aimed at minimizing app crashes
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

*In addition, we’d like to acknowledge the recent outages with Remote Start. We are working hard to resolve the issues with this feature so that Mercedes me can offer a complete ownership experience to users. Thank you for your patience.

• MBFS customers can now view the status of their payoff quote payments
• Loan payoffs are now easily viewable within your Scheduled Payments
• Bug fixes aimed at minimizing app crashes
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Enhancements to the Remote Start feature to reduce possible errors, increase reliability and allow for syncing across multiple devices
• Updates to our terms of use for Auto Pay users
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• MBFS customers can now view their past statements in the finance section
• Minor design updates throughout
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Notifications of possible pop-up events near you, starting with the Mercedes-Benz experience at Mall of America
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• A centralized online booking tool now makes it easier to schedule service
• The finance pillar has been streamlined for MBFS customers
• An optional survey was added to capture your feedback on the app
• A new message was added to the Activity Feed, alerting MBFS customers as soon as their contract is ready
• General bug fixes and performance improvements
General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Remote Start is now available with Siri. Head to the Remote Start screen to create your own custom voice command, and manage your Siri shortcuts in your App Settings (only available with iOS 12 and newer).

• General bug fixes and performance improvements
General bug fixes and performance improvements

• A more streamlined Document Center for MBFS customers
• Improvements to reduce load time in the finance section
• Updates to the MBFS Privacy Statement
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• A Paperless Statements promotion makes it easier for MBFS customers to enroll
• SiriusXM trial and subscription data is now displayed in the My Vehicles section of your profile
• General bug fixes and performance improvements
General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Introducing our Apple Watch app: start, lock, unlock or locate your vehicle right from your wrist
• A new Contact Us page for Mercedes-Benz Financial Services
• An easier-to-use calendar for scheduling payments with MBFS
• Enhanced SiriusXM trial and subscription information for eligible customers
• General bug fixes and performance improvements
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Updates for mbrace customers make it easier to view and renew your subscriptions
• The new Accident Management process helps you report damage and schedule repairs if an accident occurs
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

• For Mercedes-Benz Financial Services customers, we’ve made it easier than ever to access your financing tools.
• A redesigned Mercedes me logo.
• General bug fixes and performance improvements
General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Push notifications that alert you to activity with your mbrace® subscription or MBFS account (payment due, payment processed, etc.)
• Updates to the Inspire section, including new Partner Hotels with exclusive perks
• Helpful FAQs for MBFS customers
• Easier log-in using either an email address or phone number
• General bug fixes and performance improvements
A fix has been made to prevent users from being logged out prematurely and required to log back in. Thank you for your patience while we worked to solve this issue.
General bug fixes and performance improvements
Further work has been done to prevent users from being logged out prematurely and required to log back in. Thank you for your patience while we worked to solve this issue.
General bug fixes and performance improvements

• Push notifications let you know when your contract is ready and if a new document is available to view in the Document Center
• Updates to the Activity Feed
• General bug fixes and performance improvements
General bug fixes and performance improvements

Here’s what’s new in our latest release:
• Fresh, new background images for the home screen
• MBFS customers can now submit payments with a credit or debit card
• General bug fixes and performance improvements.

Here’s what’s new in our latest release:
• Updates to the in-app survey so we can gather valuable feedback.
• General bug fixes and performance improvements.

Here’s what’s new in our latest release:
• Push notifications for Remote Start so you’re always in the know
• General bug fixes and performance improvements

Here’s what’s new in our latest release:
• Same-day MBFS payments, processed as soon as they’re submitted.
• More options to link your MBFS account.
• Doors will now be automatically locked before a Remote Start command to increase the rate of success.
• General bug fixes and performance improvements.

Here’s what’s new in our latest release:
• MBFS Co-Buyer UpdatesBug fixes & improvements
• Improvements and support from IPAD/Tablets
• Bug fixes & improvements
General bug fixes and performance improvements
